entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
